overview:
Daniel Bernstein is the Vice President, Head of Business Development and Emerging Revenue at Meebo, a consumer Internet company that reaches nearly half of the Internet population and organizes the web around people and their interests. Meebo also provides publishers and advertisers a surprisingly simple way to leverage this massive audience by organically weaving content engagement and brand experiences into the consumer’s web experience. Bernstein oversees the company’s business development and emerging revenue strategies, and leads the business and publisher development, partnership management, emerging revenue, and technical account management teams.

Prior to Meebo, Bernstein worked in client services at Bite Communications, a global communications consultancy.

relationships.title: VP, Business Development and Emerging Revenue
